lead_paragraph: CAMEY--George. June 14, 1935 died April 14, 2016. Beloved father of Melina, Ghislaine and Francisco. Grandpa to Angelina Camey. '53 Xavier High School and '57 Fordham graduate, proud US Army Reserve Veteran. Services April 22, St. Denis, Hopewell, NY. 1/3
